titles.title: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2012
Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2012
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to reform payment to States under the Medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2012 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to revise payments to states under the Medicaid program, including granting an option to receive Medicare payments for full-benefit dual eligible individuals (who are eligible for Medicare benefits under SSA title XVIII as well as Medicaid).
